question: Can you tell me on whether you have heard of the mujtahid Taqi uddin an Nabahani. He is meant to have established his own school of thought.
answer:
QUESTION
jazakallah khairan
ANSWER


Share:
We do not know the Mujaahid in reference.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
